meanings.definition: A game played with nine pins set up in a diamond formation
meanings.sent1: We played a fun game of ninepins at the park.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed knocking down the ninepins with the ball.
meanings.sent3: During the picnic, we set up the ninepins and had a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the ball hitting the ninepins echoed through the park.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ninepins stood out against the green grass.

meanings.definition: A pin used in the game of ninepins
meanings.sent1: I picked up the wooden ninepins and set them in place.
meanings.sent2: The player aimed carefully at the last remaining ninepins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal one of the ninepins.
meanings.sent4: The old ninepins showed signs of wear from many games.
meanings.sent5: The shiny surface of the ninepins reflected the sunlight.
